description:
A penguin zombie starts acting an awful lot like Sanji, Nami continues running for her life, and Robin and Franky buy some time by blowing up a bridge!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Chivalry Remains! The Traitorous Zombie Protects Nami!
Gentleman, quoi qu`il arrive ! Le zombie traître prêt à protéger Nami
Nokoru Kishidou! Nami o Mamoru Uragiri Zombie
ظهور من السماء! ذلك الرجل هو السّيّاف المهمهم!
残る騎士道! ナミを守る裏切りゾンビ
